entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanikiluaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -33.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanikiluaq Airport 11:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -33.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -36.8°C
Wind: SW 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 31.
